summary: Light or Heavy armor, stand alone, craftable, on the game of throne theme : night\'s watch armor and stark family heater shield and frost resistance cloak
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE :1.8 VERSION OUT ! (Final version if bug free )

Ported version of Vran armor by redxavier, TH3WICK3D1, and AlphaWolf
Retextured and esp by me =)

---> Lower stats now, a bit less overpowered, specially for light version, now equal in stats to glass armor

-Added a black cloak \"Night\'s Watch Cloak\", enchanted with frost resistance, to be crafted at the tanning rack

-NOTE = Small glitch with the hood around the neck if not used with the cloak

RAVEN SHIELD SIGIL ADDED ! just overwrite the shield texture (optional DL) 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTALL :
                -drop in data folder and overwrite if asked 
                -check if .esp file enabled when launching from the laucher 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I strongly recommend to use it with  

-Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten : (USED IN SECOND SCREEN)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16438

-The sabre gear backpack from TreasureChest : 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13687

-And Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by Nivea :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13486

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have fun in this hard winter, brother of the Night\'s Watch !

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS

-The Witcher 2 Models by LordOfWar/redxavier/TH3WICK3D1 and AlphaWolf
-Witcher 2 Shield Pack by redxavier
-Fimbulvinter ENB by 1000stenar (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15386)
ENB used for the screenies
-cloak from cloak of skyrim by Nikinoodles

-... and hothtrooper44 for his fantastic armors!
author: trinkof
